Feeding away from home
The safest way of feeding your
baby away from home is to use 
a ready-to-feed milk. If this is 
not possible carry a measured 
amount of milk powder in a 
small clean and dry container, a 
flask	of	boiled	hot	water	and	an	
empty sterilised feeding bottle.
